en.bdb: One Universal Creator God. By The Grace Of The True Guru:
en.ssk: One Universal Creator God. By The Grace Of The True Guru:

es.sn: Un Dios Creador Universal, por la Gracia del Verdadero Guru.

en.bdb: Raag Maalaa:
en.ssk: Raag Maalaa:

es.sn: Rag Mala

en.bdb: Each Raga has five wives,
en.ssk: Each Raga has five wives,

es.sn: Cada Raga tiene cinco esposas y ocho hijos,

en.bdb: and eight sons, who emit distinctive notes.
en.ssk: and eight sons, who emit distinctive notes.

es.sn: quienes emiten notas distintas.

en.bdb: In the first place is Raag Bhairao.
en.ssk: In the first place is Raag Bhairao.

es.sn: En primer lugar está Rag Bhairo.

en.bdb: It is accompanied by the voices of its five Raaginis:
en.ssk: It is accompanied by the voices of its five Raaginis:

es.sn: La cuál está acompañada por las voces de sus cinco Raguinis.

en.bdb: First come Bhairavee, and Bilaavalee;
en.ssk: First come Bhairavee, and Bilaavalee;

es.sn: Primero viene Bhairavi y Bilavali,

en.bdb: then the songs of Punni-aakee and Bangalee;
en.ssk: then the songs of Punni-aakee and Bangalee;

es.sn: después los cantos de Puni-aki y Bangali

en.bdb: and then Asalaykhee.
en.ssk: and then Asalaykhee.

es.sn: y después Asalayki,

en.bdb: These are the five consorts of Bhairao.
en.ssk: These are the five consorts of Bhairao.

es.sn: estos son los cinco consortes de Bhairo.

en.bdb: The sounds of Pancham, Harakh and Disaakh;
en.ssk: The sounds of Pancham, Harakh and Disaakh;

es.sn: Los sonidos de Pancham, Jarakj y Disakj;

en.bdb: the songs of Bangaalam, Madh and Maadhav. ||1||
en.ssk: the songs of Bangaalam, Madh and Maadhav. ||1||

es.sn: los cantos de Bangalam, Madj y Madjab. (1)

verse.gurmukhi: llq iblwvl gwvhI ApunI ApunI BWiq ]
verse.unicode: ਲਲਤ ਬਿਲਾਵਲ ਗਾਵਹੀ ਅਪੁਨੀ ਅਪੁਨੀ ਭਾਂਤਿ ॥

en.bdb: Lalat and Bilaaval - each gives out its own melody.
en.ssk: Lalat and Bilaaval - each gives out its own melody.

es.sn: Lalat y Bilaval, cada una da su propia melodía,

transliteration.english: lalat bilaaval gaavahee apunee apunee bhaa(n)t ||
transliteration.hindi: ललत बिलावल गावही अपुनी अपुनी भाँति ॥
transliteration.en: lalat bilaaval gaavahee apunee apunee bhaa(n)t ||
transliteration.hi: ललत बिलावल गावही अपुनी अपुनी भाँति ॥
transliteration.ipa: lələt̪ bɪlɑʋəl Gɑʋəhi əpʊni əpʊni ɓɑⁿət̪.
transliteration.ur: للت بلاول گاوهیِ اپنیِ اپنیِ بھاںت ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: Ast puqR BYrv ky gwvih gwien pwqR ]1]
verse.unicode: ਅਸਟ ਪੁਤ੍ਰ ਭੈਰਵ ਕੇ ਗਾਵਹਿ ਗਾਇਨ ਪਾਤ੍ਰ ॥੧॥

en.bdb: when these eight sons of Bhairao are sung by accomplished musicians. ||1||
en.ssk: when these eight sons of Bhairao are sung by accomplished musicians. ||1||

es.sn: cuando estos ocho hijos de Bhairo, son cantados por músicos preparados.

transliteration.english: asaT putr bhairav ke gaaveh gain paatr ||1||
transliteration.hindi: असट पुत्र भैरव के गावहि गाइन पात्र ॥१॥
transliteration.en: asaT putr bhairav ke gaaveh gain paatr ||1||
transliteration.hi: असट पुत्र भैरव के गावहि गाइन पात्र ॥१॥
transliteration.ipa: əsəʈ pʊt̪ɹ ɓærəʋ ke Gɑʋəh Gɑeɪn pɑt̪ɹ.1.
transliteration.ur: اسٹ پُتر بھَےرو کے گاوه گاان پاتر ۔۔۱۔۔

en.bdb: In the second family is Maalakausak,
en.ssk: In the second family is Maalakausak,

es.sn: En la segunda familia está Malakusak,

en.bdb: who brings his five Raaginis:
en.ssk: who brings his five Raaginis:

es.sn: quien trae a sus cinco Raguinas,

en.bdb: Gondakaree and Dayv Gandhaaree,
en.ssk: Gondakaree and Dayv Gandhaaree,

es.sn: Gongakari y Dev Gandhari, las voces de Gandhari

en.bdb: the voices of Gandhaaree and Seehutee,
en.ssk: the voices of Gandhaaree and Seehutee,

es.sn: y Sijuti

en.bdb: and the fifth song of Dhanaasaree.
en.ssk: and the fifth song of Dhanaasaree.

es.sn: y la quinta voz de Dhanasari,

en.bdb: This chain of Maalakausak brings along :
en.ssk: This chain of Maalakausak brings along :

es.sn: la cadena de Malakusak

en.bdb: Maaroo, Masta-ang and Mayvaaraa,

es.sn: trae consigo a Maru, Masta-ang y Mevara,

en.bdb: Prabal, Chandakausak,
en.ssk: Prabal, Chandakausak,

es.sn: Praval y Chandakaosak,

en.bdb: Khau, Khat and Bauraanad singing.
en.ssk: Khau, Khat and Bauraanad singing.

es.sn: Kjao, Kjat y Baoranad, cantando.

en.bdb: These are the eight sons of Maalakausak. ||1||
en.ssk: These are the eight sons of Maalakausak. ||1||

es.sn: Estos son los ocho hijos de Malakusak. (1)

verse.gurmukhi: puin AwieAau ihMfolu pMc nwir sMig Ast suq ]
verse.unicode: ਪੁਨਿ ਆਇਅਉ ਹਿੰਡੋਲੁ ਪੰਚ ਨਾਰਿ ਸੰਗਿ ਅਸਟ ਸੁਤ ॥

en.bdb: Then comes Hindol with his five wives and eight sons;
en.ssk: Then comes Hindol with his five wives and eight sons;

es.sn: Luego viene Jindol, con sus cinco esposas y ocho hijos,

transliteration.english: pun aaiaau hi(n)ddol pa(n)ch naar sa(n)g asaT sut ||
transliteration.hindi: पुनि आइअउ हिंडोलु पंच नारि संगि असट सुत ॥
transliteration.en: pun aaiaau hi(n)ddol pa(n)ch naar sa(n)g asaT sut ||
transliteration.hi: पुनि आइअउ हिंडोलु पंच नारि संगि असट सुत ॥
transliteration.ipa: pʊn əɑɪo hɪŋɖɔl pəŋt͡ʃ nɑr səŋG əsəʈ sʊt̪.
transliteration.ur: پُن آااا هںڈول پںچ نار سںگ اسٹ سُت ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: auTih qwn klol gwien qwr imlwvhI ]1]
verse.unicode: ਉਠਹਿ ਤਾਨ ਕਲੋਲ ਗਾਇਨ ਤਾਰ ਮਿਲਾਵਹੀ ॥੧॥

en.bdb: it rises in waves when the sweet-voiced chorus sings. ||1||
en.ssk: it rises in waves when the sweet-voiced chorus sings. ||1||

es.sn: se eleva en voces cuando las dulces voces del coro cantan. (1)

transliteration.english: auTheh taan kalol gain taar milaavahee ||1||
transliteration.hindi: उठहि तान कलोल गाइन तार मिलावही ॥१॥
transliteration.en: auTheh taan kalol gain taar milaavahee ||1||
transliteration.hi: उठहि तान कलोल गाइन तार मिलावही ॥१॥
transliteration.ipa: oʊʈʰəh t̪ɑn kəlɔl Gɑeɪn t̪ɑr mɪlɑʋəhi.1.
transliteration.ur: اُٹھه تان کلول گاان تار ملاوهیِ ۔۔۱۔۔

en.bdb: There come Taylangee and Darvakaree;
en.ssk: There come Taylangee and Darvakaree;

es.sn: Ahí viene Teylangui y Darvakari,

en.bdb: Basantee and Sandoor follow;
en.ssk: Basantee and Sandoor follow;

es.sn: Basanti y Sandur siguen,

en.bdb: then Aheeree, the finest of women.
en.ssk: then Aheeree, the finest of women.

es.sn: después Ajiri, las más finas damas.

en.bdb: These five wives come together.
en.ssk: These five wives come together.

es.sn: Estas cinco esposas vienen juntas,

en.bdb: The sons: Surmaanand and Bhaaskar come,
en.ssk: The sons: Surmaanand and Bhaaskar come,

es.sn: los hijos, Surmanand y Bhaskar,

en.bdb: Chandrabinb and Mangalan follow.
en.ssk: Chandrabinb and Mangalan follow.

es.sn: Chandrabinb y Mangalan le siguen.

en.bdb: Sarasbaan and Binodaa then come,
en.ssk: Sarasbaan and Binodaa then come,

es.sn: Después vienen Sarasban y Binoda

en.bdb: and the thrilling songs of Basant and Kamodaa.
en.ssk: and the thrilling songs of Basant and Kamodaa.

es.sn: y los emocionantes cantos de Basant y Kamoda.

en.bdb: These are the eight sons I have listed.
en.ssk: These are the eight sons I have listed.

es.sn: Estos son los ocho cantos que he enlistado

en.bdb: Then comes the turn of Deepak. ||1||
en.ssk: Then comes the turn of Deepak. ||1||

es.sn: y después le llega el turno a Dipak. (1)

en.bdb: Kachhaylee, Patamanjaree and Todee are sung;
en.ssk: Kachhaylee, Patamanjaree and Todee are sung;

es.sn: Kacely, Patamanyari y Todi son entonados;

verse.gurmukhi: kwmodI Aau gUjrI sMig dIpk ky Qwip ]1]
verse.unicode: ਕਾਮੋਦੀ ਅਉ ਗੂਜਰੀ ਸੰਗਿ ਦੀਪਕ ਕੇ ਥਾਪਿ ॥੧॥

en.bdb: Kaamodee and Goojaree accompany Deepak. ||1||
en.ssk: Kaamodee and Goojaree accompany Deepak. ||1||

es.sn: Kamodi y Guyari, acompañan a Dipak. (1)

transliteration.english: kaamodhee aau goojaree sa(n)g dheepak ke thaap ||1||
transliteration.hindi: कामोदी अउ गूजरी संगि दीपक के थापि ॥१॥
transliteration.en: kaamodhee aau goojaree sa(n)g dheepak ke thaap ||1||
transliteration.hi: कामोदी अउ गूजरी संगि दीपक के थापि ॥१॥
transliteration.ipa: kɑmɔd̪i əo Gud͡ʒəri səŋG d̪ipək ke t̪ʰɑp.1.
transliteration.ur: کامودیِ اا گُوجریِ سںگ دیِپک کے تھاپ ۔۔۱۔۔

en.bdb: Kaalankaa, Kuntal and Raamaa,
en.ssk: Kaalankaa, Kuntal and Raamaa,

es.sn: Kalanka, Kuntal y Raama;

en.bdb: Kamalakusam and Champak are their names;
en.ssk: Kamalakusam and Champak are their names;

es.sn: los nombres de Kamalakusam y Champak;

en.bdb: Gauraa, Kaanaraa and Kaylaanaa;
en.ssk: Gauraa, Kaanaraa and Kaylaanaa;

es.sn: Gaura Kanara y Kaylana,

en.bdb: these are the eight sons of Deepak. ||1||
en.ssk: these are the eight sons of Deepak. ||1||

es.sn: estos son los ocho hijos de Dipak. (1)

en.bdb: All join together and sing Siree Raag,
en.ssk: All join together and sing Siree Raag,

es.sn: Todos se juntan y cantan Siri Rag,

en.bdb: which is accompanied by its five wives.:
en.ssk: which is accompanied by its five wives.:

es.sn: quien está acompañado por sus cinco esposas,

en.bdb: Bairaaree and Karnaatee,
en.ssk: Bairaaree and Karnaatee,

es.sn: Berari, Karnati,

en.bdb: the songs of Gawree and Aasaavaree;
en.ssk: the songs of Gawree and Aasaavaree;

es.sn: los cantos de Gawri y Asavari

en.bdb: then follows Sindhavee.
en.ssk: then follows Sindhavee.

es.sn: y después sigue Sindhavi,

en.bdb: These are the five wives of Siree Raag. ||1||
en.ssk: These are the five wives of Siree Raag. ||1||

es.sn: éstas son las cinco esposas de Siri Rag. (1)

verse.gurmukhi: swlU swrg swgrw Aaur goNf gMBIr ]
verse.unicode: ਸਾਲੂ ਸਾਰਗ ਸਾਗਰਾ ਅਉਰ ਗੋਂਡ ਗੰਭੀਰ ॥

en.bdb: Saaloo, Saarang, Saagaraa, Gond and Gambheer
en.ssk: Saaloo, Saarang, Saagaraa, Gond and Gambheer

es.sn: Salu, Sarang, Sagara, Gond y Gambhir.

transliteration.english: saaloo saarag saagaraa aaur go(n)dd ga(n)bheer ||
transliteration.hindi: सालू सारग सागरा अउर गोंड गंभीर ॥
transliteration.en: saaloo saarag saagaraa aaur go(n)dd ga(n)bheer ||
transliteration.hi: सालू सारग सागरा अउर गोंड गंभीर ॥
transliteration.ipa: sɑlu sɑrəG sɑGərɑ əoʊr Gɔⁿɖ Gəŋɓir.
transliteration.ur: سالُو سارگ ساگرا اار گوںڈ گںبھیِر ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: Ast puqR sRIrwg ky guMf kuMB hmIr ]1]
verse.unicode: ਅਸਟ ਪੁਤ੍ਰ ਸ੍ਰੀਰਾਗ ਕੇ ਗੁੰਡ ਕੁੰਭ ਹਮੀਰ ॥੧॥

en.bdb: - the eight sons of Siree Raag include Gund, Kumb and Hameer. ||1||
en.ssk: - the eight sons of Siree Raag include Gund, Kumb and Hameer. ||1||

es.sn: Los ocho hijos de Siri Rag incluyen a Gung, Kumb y Jamir. (1)

transliteration.english: asaT putr sreeraag ke gu(n)dd ku(n)bh hameer ||1||
transliteration.hindi: असट पुत्र स्रीराग के गुँड कुँभ हमीर ॥१॥
transliteration.en: asaT putr sreeraag ke gu(n)dd ku(n)bh hameer ||1||
transliteration.hi: असट पुत्र स्रीराग के गुँड कुँभ हमीर ॥१॥
transliteration.ipa: əsəʈ pʊt̪ɹ sɹirɑG ke Gʊŋɖ kʊŋɓ həmir.1.
transliteration.ur: اسٹ پُتر سریِراگ کے گُںڈ کُںبھ همیِر ۔۔۱۔۔

en.bdb: In the sixth place, Maygh Raag is sung,
en.ssk: In the sixth place, Maygh Raag is sung,

es.sn: En sexto lugar, Mellh Rag,

en.bdb: with its five wives in accompaniment:
en.ssk: with its five wives in accompaniment:

es.sn: es cantada, con sus cinco esposas en acompañamiento,

en.bdb: Sorat'h, Gond, and the melody of Malaaree;
en.ssk: Sorat'h, Gond, and the melody of Malaaree;

es.sn: Sorad, Gond y la melodía de Malari

en.bdb: then the harmonies of Aasaa are sung.
en.ssk: then the harmonies of Aasaa are sung.

es.sn: y después las armonías de Assa son entonadas

en.bdb: And finally comes the high tone Soohau.
en.ssk: And finally comes the high tone Soohau.

es.sn: y finalmente viene el tono alto de Sujo,

en.bdb: These are the five with Maygh Raag. ||1||
en.ssk: These are the five with Maygh Raag. ||1||

es.sn: que son los cinco que están con Mellh Rag, (1)

en.bdb: Bairaadhar, Gajadhar, Kaydaaraa,
en.ssk: Bairaadhar, Gajadhar, Kaydaaraa,

es.sn: Beradhar, Gayadhar, Kedara,

en.bdb: Jabaleedhar, Nat and Jaladhaaraa.
en.ssk: Jabaleedhar, Nat and Jaladhaaraa.

es.sn: Yabalidhar, Nat y Yaladhara,

en.bdb: Then come the songs of Shankar and Shi-aamaa.
en.ssk: Then come the songs of Shankar and Shi-aamaa.

es.sn: después los cantos de Shankar y Shi-ama.

en.bdb: These are the names of the sons of Maygh Raag. ||1||
en.ssk: These are the names of the sons of Maygh Raag. ||1||

es.sn: Estos son los nombres de los hijos de Mellh Rag. (1)

verse.gurmukhi: Kst rwg auin gwey sMig rwgnI qIs ]
verse.unicode: ਖਸਟ ਰਾਗ ਉਨਿ ਗਾਏ ਸੰਗਿ ਰਾਗਨੀ ਤੀਸ ॥

en.bdb: So all together, they sing the six Raagas and the thirty Raaginis,
en.ssk: So all together, they sing the six Raagas and the thirty Raaginis,

es.sn: Juntos todos entonan las seis Ragas y las treinta Raguinas,

transliteration.english: khasaT raag un gaae sa(n)g raaganee tees ||
transliteration.hindi: खसट राग उनि गाए संगि रागनी तीस ॥
transliteration.en: khasaT raag un gaae sa(n)g raaganee tees ||
transliteration.hi: खसट राग उनि गाए संगि रागनी तीस ॥
transliteration.ipa: kʰəsəʈ rɑG oʊn Gɑee səŋG rɑGəni t̪is.
transliteration.ur: کھسٹ راگ اُن گااے سںگ راگنیِ تیِس ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: sBY puqR rwgMn ky ATwrh ds bIs ]1]1]
verse.unicode: ਸਭੈ ਪੁਤ੍ਰ ਰਾਗੰਨ ਕੇ ਅਠਾਰਹ ਦਸ ਬੀਸ ॥੧॥੧॥

en.bdb: and all the forty-eight sons of the Raagas. ||1||1||
en.ssk: and all the forty-eight sons of the Raagas. ||1||1||

es.sn: con los cuarenta y cuatro hijos de las Ragas. (1-1)

transliteration.english: sabhai putr raaga(n)n ke aThaareh dhas bees ||1||1||
transliteration.hindi: सभै पुत्र रागंन के अठारह दस बीस ॥१॥१॥
transliteration.en: sabhai putr raaga(n)n ke aThaareh dhas bees ||1||1||
transliteration.hi: सभै पुत्र रागंन के अठारह दस बीस ॥१॥१॥
transliteration.ipa: səɓæ pʊt̪ɹ rɑGəŋn ke əʈʰɑrəh d̪əs bis.1.1.
transliteration.ur: سبھَے پُتر راگنّ کے اٹھاره دس بیِس ۔۔۱۔۔۱۔۔
